Articles.Content:
KSP Version 1.0.5

Mods: Kerbal Engineer

Issue:

I built and launched a rover from the SPH and it's not moving. The wheels are spinning and rotating but no movement. Visually, the rover wheels are sitting about 1/4 of the way into the ground.

You may have used too small wheels. This happens to me a lot, usually fixed by using different/bigger wheels.

-SPAddict

Try. ;D

No I have four of the http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/TR-2L_Ruggedized_Vehicular_Wheel

on the rover.
